description: There were several things wrong with this tab. For one, it was in the wrong time signature. It is in 3/4, not 6/4. Secondly, the tempo was way too slow. I upped it 12 bpm and I still think that is a tiny bit slower than what the song is in the studio. Finally, the bass section was horribly inaccurate. I made it as accurate as I possibly could, so now I believe the tab is a much better aid to those wanting to learn this song.
title: Spiral Static
